meta.description: Language labels for the t3o_slack extension in the FRONTEND

languageKey.label: SlackUser
You have already a slack account with your e-mail
The Slack connection is not set up correct. Please inform the adminstrator, that the API key is wrong (missing_scope)
Sorry - currently we have no connection to slack. Please try later.
Your new Slack user was created. Please check your e-mail inbox for your credencials.
Error: Configuration for Slack connection is missing. Please check TS Setting team url and API key.
